# Alatawi et al.: Microbiota and anti-TNF-α response in IBD patients

# SUPPLEMENTAL DATA

# TABLE S1. Alpha-diversity of the microbial communities’ composition among 20 stool samples of IBD patients.

# TABLE S2. Statistical analysis of alpha diversity comparison results among 20 faecal samples of IBD patients.

|Alpha|Mean (P)|SD (P)|Mean (R)|SD (R)|P value|
|---|---|---|---|---|---|
|Sobs|146.2|52.96288|158.8|52.07857|0.79118|
|chao|171.80621|48.18065|182.24373|56.33583|0.63053|
|ace|178.01213|43.03062|188.22816|56.50898|0.57874|
|Shannon|2.77377|0.72593|2.6372|0.72148|0.79594|
|Simpson|0.14311|0.09696|0.18782|0.14322|0.63053|
